official_title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States allowing castration after conviction for the rape of a child under 16 years of age.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Declares that surgical or chemical castration is permitted under the Constitution upon conviction of the rape of a child under 16 years old and does not constitute cruel and unusual punishment.
